hymn.title: Jesus, Thou alone art worthy
hymn.chords: | C - | G/B C | G - | Am - | Dm/F A | Dm G/B | C - | G - | C/E - | G/D - | C F | C/G G | Am G/B | C F | C/G G7 | C - |

layout.singingstanza: Je -- sus, Thou a -- lone art wor -- thy Cease -- less prais -- es to re -- ceive; For Thy love and grace and good -- ness Rise o'er all our thoughts con -- ceive.

lyrics.stanza: Jesus, Thou alone art worthy Ceaseless praises to receive; For Thy love and grace and goodness Rise o'er all our thoughts conceive.
With adoring heart, we render Honor to Thy precious name, Overflowing with Thy mercies, Far and wide Thy worth proclaim.
Praise Him! praise Him! praise the Savior! Saints, aloud your voices raise, Praise Him! praise Him! till in glory Perfected we'll sing His praise.
